ThingDef.label: simple grill
ThingDef.Description: A small grill used to cook meat into simple jerky or roasts. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal and wooden stuff.

ThingDef.label: butchering spot
ThingDef.Description: A makeshift spot for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: small butcher table
ThingDef.Description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: butcher table
ThingDef.Description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: fueled stove
ThingDef.Description: A simple wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal and wooden stuff.

ThingDef.label: oven
ThingDef.Description: A fueled oven for baking candies and tasty treats. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal and wooden stuff.

ThingDef.label: candy table
ThingDef.Description: A candy-making table used to make chocolate, caramel and taffy. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: milling stone
ThingDef.Description: A small muscle-powered grinding stone for quickly grinding raw plants.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste dispenser
ThingDef.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic ingredients. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method, but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for the nutrient paste dispenser or fertilizer machine.

ThingDef.label: brewery
ThingDef.Description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew Wort. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal and wooden stuff.

ThingDef.label: electric brewery
ThingDef.Description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew alocholic drinks and ethanol fuel. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: fermenting barrel
ThingDef.description: A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.

ThingDef.Name: BarrelBase
ThingDef.Description: A barrel of fermenting alcohol.

ThingDef.label: drug lab
ThingDef.Description: A work bench equipped with various containers, heaters, and measurement equipment for producing a variety of drugs.

ThingDef.label: coffee machine
ThingDef.Description: A machine for the preparation of coffee. It can also produce tea. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: hand sawmill
ThingDef.Description: A small muscle-powered hand saw for cutting logs into planks and kindling.

ThingDef.label: furnace
ThingDef.Description: A furnace used for smelting basic metal ores into metal alloys. Can make metal cans and produce charcoal from logs. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal, Peat and wooden stuff.

ThingDef.label: kiln
ThingDef.description: An impovised kiln used to produce clay bricks, burning apparel and used as crematorium. Can be fueled by Kindling, Coal, Charcoal, Peat and wooden stuff.

ThingDef.Label: glassworks table
ThingDef.Description: A table with all the tools you need to make glass. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: leatherworker table
ThingDef.Description: A worktable for crafting leather clothing from raw hides.

ThingDef.label: tailor's bench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for tailoring basic clothing from textiles.

ThingDef.label: electric tailoring bench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 40% of normal speed.

ThingDef.label: tailor's loom
ThingDef.Description: A tailor's loom that is used to spin raw materials into usable textiles. Requires power.

ThingDef.Label: recycle textile bench
ThingDef.Description: A bench to recycle used apparel into useable textiles. Recovers 50% of the original material used for the item. Apparel made from more than one resource will return nothing. Requires power. Normal speed.

ThingDef.label: mending workbench
ThingDef.Description: Requires Repair kit for a work. A workbench equipped with all the tools required to mend and repair damaged items. Works at 40% speed when not powered. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: hand assembling workbench
ThingDef.Description: A table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms and advanced mechanisms. Power needed: 300 W. Can work without electricity, but work speed will be reduced by 30%.

ThingDef.label: fueled smithy
ThingDef.Description: A fueled station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools. Can be fueled by Coal or Peat.

ThingDef.label: stonecutter's bench
ThingDef.Description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into small stone cobbles.

ThingDef.label: hand machining table
ThingDef.Description: An unpowered work table equipped to process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Reinforced concrete is prepared here as well.

ThingDef.label: sculptor's table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.

ThingDef.label: hand concrete mixer
ThingDef.Description: A muscle-powered concrete mixer. Concrete is mixed from rubble and sand.

ThingDef.label: compost bin
ThingDef.Description: Helps speed up the composting process.

ThingDef.label: fertilizer production machine
ThingDef.description: Use plants to produce fertilizer. Requires to install near hopper!

ThingDef.label: craftsman table
ThingDef.Description: A place for crafting simple things like shivs or bows.

ThingDef.label: weapon crafting workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench that produces ranged weapons like pistols and rifles. Can smelt weapons down into metal. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: advanced weapon crafting workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench that produces advanced ranged weapons like military assault rifles, missile launchers and heavy machine guns. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: ammo crafting table
ThingDef.Description: A crafting table that produces ammunition for use in guns and turrets. Can also produce sulfur from iron ore. Power needed: 500 W. Can work without electricity at 30% of normal speed.

ThingDef.label: heavy arms lathe
ThingDef.Description: A crafting table that produces ammunition for use with turrets. Can also produce sulfur from iron ore. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: primitive prosthetics bench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for production of basic prosthetics.

ThingDef.label: prosthetics workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for production of very simple prosthetics. Requires power.
